alert.note: Alert for Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 8:52AM CDT until July 30 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sioux County in south central North Dakota... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 851 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Selfridge, or 19 miles northwest of Mclaughlin, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Selfridge around 900 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Standing Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
